      • propertiesByPrefix

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> propertiesByPrefix(java.lang.String prefix)
                                                           throws XMLSpreadsheetException
        Returns an ordered list of properties by an specified index. It respects the order the user wrote the properties in at the .properties file.
        Parameters:
        prefix - Property prefix
        Returns:
        List of properties with that exact prefix, ordered by their index
        Throws:
        XMLSpreadsheetException
